authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
description: The 29-year-old tattooed model was accompanied by a female friend as she walked from her Miami Beach hotel to the Sushi Samba restaurant
title: Orange Is The New Black’s Ruby Rose steps out with mystery pal
title_page: Orange Is The New Black’s Ruby Rose steps out with mystery pal | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's one of Hollywood's biggest rising stars - a high-profile fashion model and star of Emmy Award-winning Orange Is The New Black, with an upcoming role in the Resident Evil and xXx film franchises.
But Australian-born beauty Ruby Rose still makes time to relax despite her super-busy schedule.
After performing a guest DJ set at the launch of swanky nightspot ICON Miami the previous night, the 29-year-old enjoyed a lunch date with a mystery female pal on Sunday afternoon.
Scroll down for video
Lunch date: Model Ruby Rose (right) steps out with an unknown pal (left) in Miami Beach on Sunday, the day after she performed a DJ set at the grand opening of trendy nightclub ICON Miami
Ruby stepped out of her Miami beach hotel wearing a vintage-style Harley Davidson biker T-shirt and skinny jeans, as well as stylish, yellow tinted sunglasses and a backwards-facing baseball cap.
Her many tattoos were also proudly on display, including a design based on the Japanese manga character Astro Boy visible on her right forearm.
Meanwhile, her friend opted for a black T-shirt and white-striped Adidas jacket, finishing off her look with a gold chain and black cap.
See the latest Ruby Rose updates as she spends some time in Miami
Biker chick: Ruby wore a vintage-style Harley Davidson T-shirt emblazoned with the image of a denim-clad biker as she and her pal walked through Miami Beach over the weekend
Looking good! Ruby was the centre of attention as she walked from her hotel to a nearby sushi restaurant
True to her rebellious, heavy metal-inspired fashion style, Ruby posed for photographers with the devil horns hand sign on the way to the SUSHISAMBA restaurant with her pal.
Interestingly, later that day she posted on Instagram about the troubles of dating and flirting.
Alongside a meme based on her character from Orange Is The New Black, Stella Carlin, she wrote: 'When I realize how awkward I am and how much pressure there is to find a restaurant and leave the house and that I'm not very cool and everyone's going to find out.'
Following her role as sexy inmate Stella Carlin in Orange Is The New Black, Ruby Rose has caught the attention of majors Hollywood players.
She is currently signed up to appear in upcoming action film xXx: The Return of Xander Cage, starring opposite Vin Diesel and Samuel L. Jackson.
And last year it emerged she landed a pivotal role in Resident Evil: The Final Chapter - reportedly in a bid to revive the sci-fi/horror film franchise.
Rising star: Ruby, who kept it casual on a recent lunch date, is one of Hollywood's fastest rising stars, with upcoming roles in the xXx and Resident Evil film franchises
Ruby's personal life has also been the subject of many headlines, notably since breaking off her engagement to designer Phoebe Dahl, 27, last year.
Since then, there have been reports of the former MTV VJ dating American singer-songwriter Halsey, 21, real name Ashley Nicolette Frangipane.
Back in December, just one week after announcing the split from Phoebe, the pair were spotted spending time together in Los Angeles.
